segments.text: It's a lot of work running a campaign , isn't it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had no idea when I volunteered to assist governor Brown with this campaign what I was getting myself into .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hang in there . The hardest part is just about over .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How Ay years have you been working with him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 15 . I've seen him work hard for a lot of good changes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's easier doing this kind hard work when I know that I trust the man behind the posters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you know we're trying to talk him into considering a presidential campaign ?
segments.speaker: S1
